short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage, monitor, and delete third-party cookies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your browsing experience with the User-friendly Cookie Manager! This intuitive Chrome plugin lets you effortlessly view all the cookies installed in your browser in real-time. Whether you're looking to manage your privacy or simply clean up your browsing data, this tool provides a seamless way to monitor and manage your cookies.

With just a few clicks, you can:

View Cookies in Real-Time: Instantly see which cookies are active and their details.
Delete Individual Cookies: Remove specific cookies with ease to protect your privacy or resolve issues.
Clear All Cookies: Quickly delete all cookies from your browser to start fresh.
Designed for simplicity and efficiency, the User-friendly Cookie Manager is your go-to solution for maintaining a cleaner, more secure browsing environment.
